title: Hierarchy
description: stylized standing human body on a platform, PR hand on hip; off-center \"head\" is swirling ovoid pod; staff-like vertical element with protruding leaves in front of PL arm; balancing on forked top of staff and \"head\" is horizontal bar with chain with globe inside an open box and leafed branch hanging from one end and axe perched on geometric form and stylized human head on opposite end; black and green patina
creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
